N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 576.5 - Standards pertaining to eligibility for payment

State Regulations
(a) A residential treatment facility is
eligible for payment under the Medical Assistance Program under the following
conditions: (1)

The residential treatment
facility has a valid operating certificate issued by the Office of Mental

Health, in accordance with Part 584 of this Title. (2)

The residential treatment facility
complies with applicable requirements of title XIX of the Social Security Act
and regulations promulgated thereunder. (3)

The residential treatment facility
complies with applicable requirements of title 11 of article 5 of the Social

Services Law and regulations promulgated thereunder. (b) A residential treatment facility is
eligible for payment for services provided to residents under the following
conditions: (1)

The resident has been
determined to be eligible for the Medical Assistance Program. (2)

The resident has been authorized for
admission to the residential treatment facility in accordance with Part 584 of
this Title. (c) The
residential treatment facility is eligible for payment for each patient day and
for each reserved bed day. (d) The
residential treatment facility is eligible for payment at the per diem rate
established pursuant to the provisions of Part 578 of this Title. (e) The residential treatment facility is the
only provider of services eligible for payment under the Medical Assistance

Program for services provided to a resident of the residential treatment
facility including a resident for whom a bed has been reserved except as
follows: (1)

Hospitals other than residential
treatment facilities are eligible for payment for inpatient services. (2)

Hospitals other than residential
treatment facilities are eligible for payment for emergency services and for
outpatient services provided as an alternative to hospitalization for medical
care other than psychiatric care. (3)

Vendors who supply prosthetic or orthotic
appliances and devices including hearing aids are eligible for payment for such
appliances or devices in accordance with the established requirements of the

Medical Assistance Program. Notes
